name: Doom Laser
author: Alucard648
info: A almighty laser beam.Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: Doom Laser, invented by otherworldhy engineer named Quickman. It takes time to fire and travel and can be obscured by solid combos......But one touch - and Link will be ISTANTLY DISINTEGRATED, no sell!!! Technically he will be warped to dungeon entrance with +1 to death count. if D4 is set to 0.Update 19, 11, 2021 - Now supports interaction with optic combos - mirrors, prisms etc... Requested by P-Tux7
setup: Requires ghost.zh1. Set up 2 laser tiles, horizontal then vertical.2. Import and compile the script. It requires ghost.zh and all his dependencies.3. Place FFC where laser starts.D0 - Delay between script init and laser firing, in frames.D1 - Laser direction.D2 - Tile used to draw laser, 1 frame stretched.D3 - Laser travel speed, in pixels per frame. Default is 2.D4 - Damage. Cheap Chiniese materials!
